metadata.Title: CVE-2018-12291 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
The on_get_missing_events function in handlers/federation.py in Matrix Synapse before 0.31.1 has a security bug in the get_missing_events federation API where event visibility rules were not applied correctly.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-12291` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

matrix-synapse - 0.24.0+dfsg-1ubuntu0.1~esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: matrix-synapse package in esm-apps/bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.24.0+dfsg-1ubuntu0.1~esm1').
